title: Sleigh, late 18th century
description: Sides and ends painted with views of buildings and street scenes; one on right side shows building with national flag and date 1627.  Ornamented, especially on back, with pierced, carved and gilded wood scrollwork.  Inside maroon.  Runners with pointed studs.

tombstone.epitaph: Sleigh, late 18th century. Painted wood, iron. 1929-10-1-a,b.
